thread.title: Brief power outage darkens CES tech, electronics show

title: Brief power outage darkens CES tech, electronics show
text:
Brief power outage darkens CES tech, electronics show Thursday, January 11, 2018 - 00:36 
The digital economy's big annual trade show, CES, suffers a brief, disruptive plunge into darkness after a power outage, blamed on a glitch caused by heavy rain. No reporter narration. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The digital economy's big annual trade show, CES, suffers a brief, disruptive plunge into darkness after a power outage, blamed on a glitch caused by heavy rain. No reporter narration.
